properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 11:27AM EST until January 12 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT....East southeast increasing to 20 knots with combined
seas 6 to 8 feet. Winds and seas peak Friday into Saturday night
ahead of approaching cold front with winds south 20 to 25 knots
and combined seas up to 10 feet. Winds and seas begin to
decrease Sunday.

* WHERE...Northeast Florida coastal waters from Fernandina Beach
FL to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO NOON EST SUNDAY
